veteran-1.text: Hey {g:buddy/lady}, I take it the prof asked you here too? Not sure what he wants with a grunt like me. Whaddya suppose is down there in them crypts?

responses.veteran-2: A grunt? Were you in the Great War?
responses.veteran-3: Well, given this collection of people here, I'm thinking these are no ordinary crypts. Guess we'll see. So he didn't give you any reason why he invited you here?

veteran-1a.text: Hey {g:bud/lady}, back again? What can this ol vet do for ya?

responses.veteran-2: So you were in the Great War?
responses.veteran-3: I forgot, why are you here?

end-1.message: I could use your services. Why don't you join me?

veteran-2.text: {g:Yessir/Yes'm}, in the front lines on the Western front. Was damn lucky to make it back in one piece I tells ya.

responses.veteran-3: And what's your reason for being here?

end-1.message: Ok, I could definitely use you. Why don't you join me?

end-2.message: Sorry, I need to go. I'll talk to you later.

veteran-3.text: Oh, well the professor just said he wanted someone used to dangerous situations. I guess he figgers my sperience in the trenches could commin handy?

end-1.message: Ok, I could definitely use you. Why don't you join me?

end-2.message: Sorry, I need to go. I'll talk to you later.

veteran-4.text: Hmm, I thinks you've gots 'nuff buddies with ya already. Come back again if ya need me!

responses.veteran-6: I don't have need of you now.

veteran-6.text: Okie, I'll be around the museum if ya need me again.
